history.content: How are you staying involved with campus activities, during this time of virtual learning? Want an opportunity to be involved on our virtual campus? Well, we have the opportunity just for you. ESC is accepting applications to be a mentor in our freshman mentoring program. You will be able to share your personal experience and connection to various movements/organizations on campus. It is a rewarding experience where you get to help the freshman class facing the most daunting first year yet, while also increasing your extracurricular involvement. Also, we encourage you to seize this opportunity to market your organizations to our body of freshman. Fill out an application here: https://forms.gle/9m7qu9yXXxPy655F9
history.subject: Join the ESC Mentor Program
